title: Smoking is bad, kids.
body: Graves quit smoking cigars all the time, and now look how strong he is!

replies.body: *lights cigar* This one's for you, Graves!
Reported for intentionally feeding cancer.
Who called?
Name is Lane Cancer with a Graves profile.  That is a hilarious coincidence.
Well, they don't call him "BuffsOP" for nothing.
I just played with you earlier and now I find a comment by you on the boards O_O

I'm sure I probably fed like hell, too.

EDIT: TANK-SHACO!

I suppose I didn't do too bad. Not as good as I'd like, though. Don't carry if you don't have to.
uhhh he has 4-10 bullets?

It's a buckshot round with 4 or 10 pellets.

This doesn't make any sense in terms of actual guns, but yeah.
I think he's referring to the 2 + 1 you get from Quickdraw.
I'm just being a gun nerd. Shotguns don't shoot bullets. They shoot slugs or buckshots. His Q and R are slugs and his autos are buckshots. They are both a type of round.
Bunch of powder in a canister dumping onto the ground = slug http://res.cloudinary.com/urbandictionary/image/upload/a_exif,c_fit,h_200,w_200/v1395991705/gjn81wvxqsq6yzcwubok.png
Of course. I live in the mountains in Idaho... up here shotguns load either slugs or shells--never bullets. Though I'm not sure why anyone would load a slug into a side by side...
There's also Birdshot, which is what most skeet and trap players use.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BeocjX2CIAAs_Bx.jpg

{{champion:104}} This is your brain: "Welcome to Summoner's Rift" This is your brain on drugs: "You have been slain" This is your brain on cigars: "Double kill!" This is what happens when you think it's ok to take away my post game smoke: "An enemy has been slai...Doublekill.....Triple kill....Quadra...Pentakill!!!....Hexakill....Double ACE!!!!!!" That's right, you take away my cigar and I ace both teams. Give it back.

xD

Looking forward to 6v6 all Graves.

Someone went through and downvoted all the {{champion:104}} jokes....

EDIT: So I upvoted them all :D
Fun this with this is that this guy was standing at -1.

Riot took his cigar. He would've never stopped smoking in the first place i'm sure.
Just another riot crap favoritism. What about gragas alcohol ?
What about Singed's mobile meth lab?
{{champion:27}} _Hey {{champion:19}}, wanna cook?_

and he paid Riot so he could get buffed :^)

Strangely ... it's true :O 

**#RITOPLS**
I wanted to make a Illusionist Mage champion that uses smoke to make illusions and stuff but I would know that Riot would hate that idea QQ

everyone is strong after getting love from CertainlyT.... Why couldnt he give some love for mah bird {{champion:133}}??  

petition for CertainlyT to re-rework Quinndred And No Valor

Actually _**CertainlyT**_ was not in charge of Quinn. Try _**RiotRepertoir**_ instead..

Quinn rework was a success. I am a veteran {{champion:133}}  player (since s3) and I miss _**Valor**_ as everyone else. However, {{champion:133}} 's gameplay has changed - from my point of view - **positive from before**(mainly due to all the bugfixes). 

The problem you are implying is merely thematical.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

>  Why couldnt he give some love for mah bird ?? 

i know it wasnt certainlyt who reworked her, i was just asking 
Why couldnt he give some love for mah bird??

quinn rework sucks, she HAS to hit her q to do anything (sure it raises her difficult cap, but it makes her gameplay stupidly strong or "bye, i'm not going to fight you" in case she misses) she lost a lot of damage in her ult but got some nice mov. speed and the crit in harrier making she build crit like she was a commom adc (........sigh)

RR job in fixing bug in her e was great and thats all

he gave her more dps but ruined everything else (<3 u RR, thnx for skaner,kog,quinndred)

champs update team:~~ "we'll preserve what you love, promise"~~ "new players enjoy and we'll not revert it"

You have a right for your opinion. IMO the only thing they destroyed was bruiser Valor. 

I personally still prefer **assassin** and **off-tank** {{champion:133}} (sterak's core) and they still work just fine (assassin even better than before with passive multi-proc, thunderlords and armor Pen enough to true damage). Riot has also given her some shiny new toys like {{item:3812}}{{item:3094}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3142}} 

I have never seen any considerable {{champion:133}} player build _crit_ on her aside {{item:3094}} and maybe late game {{item:3031}}  as core. **Crit is a side stat on her**. The cdr in her passive is a noob trap..  

{{champion:133}} had bugs on her _passive_, _q_, _w passive_, _e _ **_AND_**  _ult_. It was frustrating and ubreliable to play and the reason why I seldom played her in ranked pre-rework. 

**Your comment** is valid and has good points - and you seem to be a person who puts thought on his arguments - but most of them only become problems if one isn't able to adapt into the **current meta** and what she is about now. 

The thing I love in new {{champion:133}} is her insane mobility and consistent burst - due to new ult and e speed increase. She has clear **Pros** and **cons**. {{champion:133}} is amazing _duelist_ and _executioner_ (even without ult execution). She struggles in the beginning of the **teamfights** and **late game** - despite being a mid game _splitpusher/assassin_ God. And **cc**.. God save us all.. 

The only thing I dislike in the rework is - thematics - she was a **duo-champion** but her identity is kinda crushed now. Well, one has to make sacrifices..

Tl;Dr: That was a wall of text - read it, if you could. :)

I rush IE on Quinn all the time when I play her as traditional botlane ADC and I do perfectly fine. Hell even when I play her jg I sometimes build it as my first item after warrior (Never played her top I refuse to do that to another human being)

IE is perfectly fine - especially if you play her in botlane. However, I'd not consider crit as a core stat on Quinn, even though her passive scales from it (poorly). Hell, I build IE for ad and secondary crit. I answered mainly for this argument which I'll repost here - had No intent to offend adc Quinns (which I am, occasionally):

>she lost a lot of damage in her ult but got some nice mov. speed and the crit in harrier making she build crit like she was a commom adc (........sigh)
This joke gave me _cancer_
I hope that {{champion:79}} never stops drinking alcohol
RIP Graves cigar...
Smokin' Barrels.
i enjoy cigars. they're very relaxing.
cigars aren't even that bad for you.. you don't inhale the smoke, you taste it.

> [{quoted}](name=Treasure Goblin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=owbe2Z3w,comment-id=001d,timestamp=2016-02-09T17:52:32.241+0000)
>
> cigars aren't even that bad for you.. you don't inhale the smoke, you taste it.

You ever heard of mouth and throat cancer? Do you really think inhaling is what makes smoking bad for you? Do you vape? You probably vape.

Meh, every man to himself.

I like sniffing markers from time to time
